summary:
Verdiana Follower Mod

Verdiana is a 1h Combat Follower

you can Find her by the Standing stones near Riverwood. she wears a Dawnguard heavy armor.
descriptionHtml:
Verdiana Follower Mod

Verdiana is a 1h Combat Follower

you can Find her by the Standing stones near Riverwood. she wars a Dawnguard heavy armor.

she is Immortal and you can Marry her.

to use her you need these mods

she uses the body you are useing for the Rothwardon race. 

Mikan Eyes

And ﻿KS Hairdos - Renewal

please try it and give me your feedback[i]  [/i]and show me your scrennshots.

Tg mods can be seen in the picThe following mods can be seen in the pictures

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259]Remodeled Armor for CBBE[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056?]Mikan Eyes[/url]﻿

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]﻿

Many Thanks goes to the creators of those mods.
author: Satadoros
